import React, { useContext, useRef } from 'react' import './NavBar.css' import { useState } from 'react' import logo from '../Assets/logo.png' import cart_icon from '../Assets/cart_icon.png' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import { ShopContext } from '../../Context/ShopContext' const NavBar = () => { const {getTotalCartItems} = useContext(ShopContext); const [menu, setMenu] = useState("shop"); const menuRef = useRef(); return (

Shopper.com

  • {setMenu("shop")}}> Shop {menu==="shop"?
    :<>}
  • {setMenu("men")}}> Men {menu==="men"?
    :<>}
  • {setMenu("women")}}> Women {menu==="women"?
    :<>}
  • {setMenu("kids")}}> Kid {menu==="kids"?
    :<>}
{getTotalCartItems()}
) } export default NavBar
